featured.text: It can be used to show, for example, disagreement or lack of interest.
People in this community tend to _____ with the group they belong to, and often put group interests before personal ones.
It is believed that this would be to the best interest of all people, __(25)__ teens who might be tempted to start smoking.
Charles has a strong interest in technology.

other.text: However, recent studies have shown (70) interest in storytelling for adults is returning.
1. Visit the websites of these colleges and find out which college has departments ___(27)___ courses that interest you or will help you prepare for your future career.
But this is just not something that will ever interest me.
And Africa fueled another interest in him: photography.
The young generation in this country has shown less interest in factory work and other _____ labor jobs, such as house construction and fruit picking.
Or telephone Ms. (2) Have interest or experience in marketing Chang at 2945-0027 for an immediate interview.
Still others think that most aliens visit Earth to study us like our scientists study primitive natives and animals, and have no interest in helping us __(40)__.
Actually, one of their main interests was the art of deception.
Picking up on teens' interest in computer games, Hilfiger sponsored a Nintendo competition and installed Nintendo terminals in his stores.

definition.zh_def: 興趣；關心或好奇的感覺。
definition.en_def: A feeling of wanting to know or learn about something or someone.
definition.example: She has a keen interest in photography.
